features: 【Exclusive Built-in Sharpener】Kitchen knife set with sharpener is amazing. It saves you from having to honing blades on a sharpening steel.

【Premium Knife Set】Made of forged, high-carbon one-piece German stainless steel, this cutlery knife block set is tarnish-resistant and rust-resistant.Perfect for both professional chefs and beginner. Easy to Clean Up: Hand-wash for best results.

【Best Sharp Knife Set】Optimized weight and good balance make this kitchen knife set fit nicely in the palm of hand. Exclusive taper grind edge technology provides optimum sharpness for precise cutting and is easy to re-sharpen.

【Value Knife Set】15 pieces knife set with block includes: 8" chef knife, 8" slicing knife, 5" santoku knife, 5.5" serrated utility knife, 5" fine edge utility knife, 3.5" paring knife, 6pcs 4.5" serrated steak knife, 2 pairs of kitchen shears, and hard wood knife block with built-in sharpener.

【Service】McCook knife sets for kitchen with block is easy and fast to clean. Perfect gift for Valentine's Day, Wedding, Birthday, Housewarming, Thanksgiving, Halloween, Christmas. We provide one-year warranty for every customer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: McCook MC29 German Stainless Steel Knife Sets for Kitchen with Block The McCook chefs knife set features a knife block with built-in sharpener designed to keep kitchen knives at optimum sharpness every time you use them. It's a complete block knife set that has every tool you could ever need to cut, chop, slice, dice when preparing your next meal with joy.

What's Included in This Beautiful Block Knife Set? 1-piece 8"chef knife 1-piece 8"slicing knife 1-piece 5"santoku knife 1-piece 5.5"serrated utility knife 1-piece 5" fine edge utility knife 1-piece 3.5" paring knife 6-piece 4.5" serrated steak knives 2 pairs kitchen shears 1-piece knife block with built-in sharpener

Featured Knives in the Knives Sets for Kitchen 8" Chef Knife An indispensable all-purpose kitchen chef knife that can be used for chopping, mincing, slicing and dicing just about any ingredient. 5" Santoku Knife Use this knife for chopping vegetables and other smaller sized ingredients. Suitable for both home and restaurant kitchens.

All-in-One Knives Set with Block It's a complete kitchen cooking knife set that has every tool you could ever need to cut, chop, slice, dice when preparing your next meal with joy. 5" Utility Knife & Kitchen Shears Fine edge utility knife is a versatile knife. All-purpose shears with sharp blade and ergonomic grip help handle kitchen task with ease.

Forged Full Tang Kitchen Knife Set Made of forged, high-carbon one-piece German stainless steel, these kitchen knives are ultra-sharp, non-stick and rust-resistant. Perfect for both professional and beginner. Block Knife Set with Sharpener The built-in sharpener is amazing. Please put knife blade on the V angle of the ceramic rods, pull back and forth for sharpening.(Only for fine edge blade sharpening)

McCook MC29 Modern Designed Kitchen Knife Set with Block for Home Comes in a gift box, this knife block set is an attractive and practical Christmas Gift, Mother's Day Gift, Easter Gift, Valentine's Day Gift, House Warming Gifts, Thanksgiving Gift, New Home, Anniversary & Wedding Gifts for Couple, Cool Bridal Shower Gift for Women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Glam kitchen award!
reviews.reviewText: The new high end trend that is building steam, are glam kitchens. Mixing elements of gold and Diamond, bejeweled cabinet knobs and marble everything, glam kitchens have arrived! These gold knives come with the most beautiful knife block you have ever seen, expertly designed built in knife sharpener, and bonus scissors, make this knife set a must have for glam kitchens!The knifes are strong and sharp, they cut effortlessly, the handles grip-but don’t slip! They are beautifully designed, with multiple knife blades that are perfectly weighted for every cooking endeavor you could ever have, as well as enhance your stunning countertops. They make granite, marble or quartez counter tops look even more epic! These knives put the desire in fading hearts whose dinner regiment has become boring, a fantastic desire to Chop, dice, and slice up a delicious meal for the whole family to enjoy. they are beautiful dynamic and ergonomic! Great for singles or families.The knife block is sturdy and streamlined, it doesn’t take up much room on the counter top at all. The precessioned angle allows smooth pull out of the knives, without any uncomfortable arching of the wrist. Creating a pleasant meal preparation experience. These well crafted knives are an elegant focal feature for glam kitchens. The knives look great and feel great, with white and gold esthetics they are very pleasing to the senses.The small steak knives are a work of art, they have a gorgeous gold near lacquered finish on them, they look extremely high end. They feel perfectly balance in the hand. Even if you are a vegetarian the small serrated knives cut through salads and warms rolls or pizza perfectly! No more mashing your food to death, these blades cut pleasingly through food preserving the artistry of the dish through to the last bite! These knives are perfection! If I was going to give them an award they would get the Glam kitchen award for excellence in design and cutlery.I think the manufacturer of this product really thought of us especially with the bonus scissors, one set can be used for clipping herbs like cilantro and mint outdoors, the other can be used for cutting fresh pasta in doors. Thank you for the amazing glam-gold knives and knife block with sharpener and bonus scissors. Life would be so much sweeter if all products were created as thoughtfully to the consumer as this one, because they thought of space, ergonomics, quality of materials, cost, and in the event a pair of kitchen shears are lost or broken, they included a bonus. Not to mention a gorgeous aesthetic!. Great job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations ✨✨
reviews.reviewText: I’ll be honest here. I purchased these knives solely because they were pretty and I wanted some bling for my kitchen. When my boyfriend saw what I had done, he cringed because he wanted ‘manly’ knives that cut things well and didn’t care about how they looked. I’m happy to report we both got what we wanted. Not only are they pretty to look at and don’t take up much room on the counter, but they are also sharp and solid feeling. So far neither of us have any complaints. The one thing I don’t care for though is the built in sharpener. He prefers to use his own sharpener, and I feel like they could have used that space for something else. Maybe a peeler or small scissors for herbs?! Just an idea for the manufacturer to think about. Overall, it’s a great set for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set of knives for my son for Christmas. He loved them! Very well formed handles and sharp edges. I love the looks of these and also the cutting ability and the assortment of blades. I wish I had picker up a set for myself to replace the ones I have! Even the holder has a very modern look to i and looks great out on his countertop! I am very pleased with this purchase, They also arrived in a very short time in spite of the fact I ordered them very shortly before the holidays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They look great and are sharp! I don't think I would buy them again but they work for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This knife set replaced an old set with silicone covered handles that were peeling. The blades were losing sharpness shortly after sharpening. While these new ones are a cheaper set than many available, they are sharp and functional; great for our needs to chop meat and vegetables. We are hand washing and drying them. Great value as there are pizza and cheese knives as well, and a built in sharpener. Convenient for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great buy !
reviews.reviewText: The quality is AMAZING !!!! It’s beautiful and completely stands out. Love how it makes me feel when I’m cooking (silly I know, but it’s the little things) and it cuts PERFECTLY! High quality knifes, makes cooking so much easier. I’m in love !*Please make sure when you wash them, you dry them quickly. Other reviews say the color fades. Haven’t seen with my set but you never know. And the instructions say hand wash only. Not dishwasher friendly *

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice knife set
reviews.reviewText: I have to say that I really like this knife set. Overall I find the quality to be surprisingly good for a budget knife set. I've had nice, expensive knife sets and for the price this set compares favorably to those sets. The set came nice and sharp and I have found that they retain an edge pretty well. The handles of the knives are not solid and the knives look heavier than they are in actuality. These knives do need to be taken care of and you cannot put them in a dishwasher. These should be hand washed and dried. Although the handles are made of metal, I found that I had no problem maintaining a good grip on them. The included steak knives are serrated. The one issue I have is the built in knife sharpener. I found this feature less useful for me and I would have preferred a steel to the built in sharpener, since I already had a more than adequate knife sharpener. But that's a small niggle. This set looks good on my counter and is very functional and I highly recommend it if you need a nice knife set on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Knives are one solid piece. No water can penetrate and cause rust. Nice solid knife set.
reviews.reviewText: Price was great. Product is excellent. Looks nice, very sharp. Everyday use, cutting meat, vegetables.
Ni un mes de uso y ya se rallaron todos, malísima calidad por un precio tan alto
The knifes are so sharp and what you need to prepare your meals.
Entire set rusted in just a few short weeks. Definitely not stainless steel. Will try to return.
